summary: A structured container that holds the results of the X‑CLIP multimodal model, including optional contrastive loss, video‑text similarity logits, projected text and video embeddings, and the raw outputs of the underlying text, vision, and integration transformer components.
business_intent: Enable downstream applications such as video‑text retrieval, ranking, and training pipelines to access loss values, similarity scores, and embeddings in a unified format for evaluation, optimization, and further processing.
